data.title: Green as Greta? Environmental Issues in the 2019 European Election Campaigns
data.sourcetitle: The 2019 European Electoral Campaign: in the Time of Populism and Social Media
data.abstract: This chapter focuses on environmental issues and to what extent climate change was visible as an issue during the EU election campaign. The results indicate that the topic was primarily limited to member states in the Continental and North Western regions of the EU.
